description: Anomalies that are easily and safely contained.
Anomalies that require more resources to contain completely or where containment is not always reliable.
Anomalies that are exceedingly difficult to contain consistently or reliably.
Anomalies that are used by the Foundation to contain or counteract other anomalies.
Anomalies that are uncontainable and will inevitably lead to widespread destruction or the end of the world.
Anomalies that have been rendered inert or non-anomalous.
Anomalies that are no longer accessible or have been sealed off.
Anomalies that have been fully understood and can be explained by current scientific knowledge.
Anomalies that pertain specifically to humans with anomalous properties or abilities.
Anomalies that do not fit into any established object class or have unique containment requirements.
